trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for choosing a folder from the file system.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface de usuário para escolher uma pasta do sistema de arquivos.

trans-unit.source: You may customize the folder options by inheriting from this class and overriding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.InitializeDialog%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode personalizar as opções de pasta herdar desta classe e substituindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.InitializeDialog%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.InitializeDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified object using the editor style provided by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.GetEditStyle*>.
trans-unit.target: Edita o objeto especificado usando o estilo de editor fornecido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.GetEditStyle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicional.
Um provedor de objeto de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object, or the old value if the object couldn't be updated.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do objeto ou valor antigo se o objeto não pôde ser atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de edição usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.EditValue*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.EditValue%2A> method is not supported, this will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.EditValue%2A>método não é suportado, isto retornará <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> enumeration value indicating the provided editing style.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> estilo de valor de enumeração que indica a edição fornecido.
